193.heading: Essays.
193.title: "Pining Away for Kudzu Dubose"
193.author: Marlette.
notes: Summary: Ida Mae Wombat reads her essay about her Summer vacation, which included computer camp, selling dental floss door-to-door, rushing the stage when Leonard Nimoy appeared at an sf convention in Atlanta, and writing Kudzu's name in magic markers all over her loose-leaf notebook.
